summary: A heart-warming comedy about the friendship between the new kid in town and a soccer-playing dog on the lam from the dog-catcher. It's up to these two underdogs to win the PeeWee Soccer League championship game.
cast: James Marshall|Olivia d'Abo|Jeremy Foley|Sam McMurray|Burton Gilliam|Billy Drago|Kyle Gibson|Evan Matthew Cohen|Brocker Way|Bill Capizzi|Kirk Baily|Brad Grunberg|Carrie Genzel|Franklin Dennis Jones|Douglas S. title: Soccer Dog: The Movie
